Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero/Cermak
ShortDescription: Northbound 54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via CIcero, 16th, and turn around inside of 16th and Ciero Terminal for layover near Cicero/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via CIcero, 16th, and turn around inside of 16th and Ciero Terminal for layover near Cicero/Cermak.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
